message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.HC, cs.CY, cs.MM

The paper proposes a deep learning-based method for automatic segmentation of food on a plate, which falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category. The use case of the proposed method is in long-term care homes, which involves monitoring and measuring nutritional intake, and thus can also be categorized under human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and cybernetics (cs.CY). The method involves training a deep convolutional neural network (DCNN), which falls under the machine learning (cs.LG) sub-category. Finally, the paper evaluates the proposed method on a novel dataset, which can also be categorized under multimedia (cs.MM).
